app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Translator OneTrans
app_description: Do you have difficulties in communicating with foreigners or reading foreign books Use OneTrans Now solving all your translation problems. With Multi Modle translation ways OneTrans will become your best companion for travel learning and communication. Text Translation Text translation function can help you easily translate any text into multiple languages.Simply enter or paste the text that needs to be translated and we will immediately provide you with the translation results.In addition if you use OneTrans s keyboard you can directly enter text on the keyboard and instantly obtain translation results without switching to other applications or browsers. Voice Translation OneTrans can instantly convert what you say into other languages and play it out in voice format making cross language communication more convenient.With the voice translation function you don t need to manually input text. You can quickly achieve translation through voice input saving time and effort. Photo Translation By using the Photo translation function you can take an image containing the text to be translated and OneTrans will automatically recognize and convert it into text in the selected language for you to understand its meaning. Real Time Translation The real time translation function is a technology that can instantly translate languages into other languages saving you time of waiting. Premium privilege Access to all features without limitation Best experience with No ads Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Come download OneTrans now! Whether you need real time translation language learning or cross cultural communication OneTrans will provide you with convenient and accurate translation services. Download now to speak freely with people around the world and break language barriers!
